name: Lisa Paglia
what_you_do: Lisa Paglia is a sleep researcher and expert who focuses on the effects of sleep medications on brain health, particularly in relation to dementia risk.
who_you_serve: Her target audience includes older adults and their caregivers, as well as healthcare professionals interested in sleep health and dementia.
social_proof: Dr. Yue Leng, a notable researcher in the field, collaborates with Lisa Paglia on studies related to sleep and dementia.
